Andres Ponce

Hello There

My name is Andrés Ponce. I was born and grew up in Honduras and currently live and work in Taipei, Taiwan. I did my master’s degree in computer science at National Cheng Kung University under Professor Kuo Yau Hwang (郭耀煌). I did my undergraduate degree at National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University.
